instructions:
Mix carrots, parsnips, turnips, green onions, rice and raisins in a large bowl.
Mix mayonnaise, yogurt and lemon juice together and fold into vegetable mixture.
Season with salt and pepper.
Sprinkle with nuts and serve on a bed of fresh baby spinach.
ingredients: 3 green onions, trimmed and finely sliced
3 tablespoons toasted and salted sunflower nuts
title: Fresh Root Vegetable, Raisin & Rice Salad
